TheWord.Title: This is My Spirit I give to You, this is our love that we share, together.

Remember.Commentary: My spirit will go before you and I will give you rest (Exodus 33:14). Be as wise as serpent, harmless as doves. 20030621: 172nd day. There are 1615 days, 4 biblical years and 175 days, between 19990118 and 20030621. There are 207 days between 20021126 and 20030621 (Exodus 33:14). 82 days: 2 biblical months and 22 days.

Remember.Commentary: Godliness: 19 verses. No old testament scripture references. Simon Peter, a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ, to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God, and of Jesus our Lord, According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness, through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust. And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge; And to knowledge temperance; and to temperance patience; and to patience godliness; And to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity. For if these things be in you, and abound, they make you that you shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ (2 Peter 1:1-8). Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved, what manner of persons ought you to be in all holy conversation and godliness (2 Peter 3:11). Now they began on the first day of the first month to sanctify, and on the eighth day of the month came they to the porch of the LORD: so they sanctified the house of the LORD in eight days; and in the sixteenth day of the first month they made an end (2 Chronicles 29:17). 188th day. I will render unto you. 66 days: 2 biblical months and 6 days.
